# 1. Data Wrangling

## 1.1 (Q1)
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(Stat2Data)
data("Hawks")
library(dplyr)
hSF <- Hawks %>% filter(Species == "Red-tailed" & Weight >= 1000) %>% select(Wing, Weight, Tail)
print(hSF)
```
